title: Hextech Crafting issues
body: Has anyone else had an issue where opening the free box disconnects them from the PVP.net server?

replies.body:
Yes - even with Total Virgins fix i am still having the same issue. I have been emailing back and forward with support. They're trying to say it's my connection.. I have 100mb/s NBN... lol..

I ran all their tests and they came out perfect... So let's see what they have to say now :(
Ive been having an issue, when i try to forge the 3 key fragments into a key I get disconnected from the pvp client. Not sure why because it worked when hextech was first introduced. Any help anyone?
just posted the fix which should help you. Had the same issue, issue resolved.
